Package ohos.data.async

Class RdbStoreAsyncHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.eventhandler.EventHandler
      • ohos.data.async.RdbStoreAsyncHandler

  • public class RdbStoreAsyncHandler
extends EventHandler
    Provides interfaces to asynchronously add, delete, modify, and query data of the local database.

    This class provides two threads, a work thread and a callback thread. The work thread implements data operations; the callback thread processes data operation results.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_APPDATAMGR

    • Method Detail

      • addQueryJob

        public final void addQueryJob​(JobParams jobParams,
                              String[] columns,
                              RdbPredicates rdbPredicates,
                              QueryCallback queryCallback)
        Queries data in the database asynchronously and processes the query result.

        Use this method when querying a large amount of data in the database in the intra-process scenario.

        Parameters:
        jobParams - Indicates mandatory parameters of the task. For details, see JobParams.
        columns - Indicates the columns where the data to be queried resides. If it is null, data in all the columns will be queried.
        rdbPredicates - Indicates the RdbPredicates. It is mandatory and cannot be null.
        queryCallback - Indicates the QueryCallback used to process the query result. It is mandatory and cannot be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a parameter is illegal.
        Since:
        3

      • addInsertJob

        public final void addInsertJob​(JobParams jobParams,
                               String tableName,
                               ValuesBucket valuesBucket,
                               InsertCallback insertCallback)
        Inserts data into the database asynchronously and processes the insertion result.

        Use this method when inserting a large amount of data into the database in the intra-process scenario.

        Parameters:
        jobParams - Indicates mandatory parameters of the task. For details, see JobParams.
        tableName - Indicates the name of the table into which the data is to be inserted.
        valuesBucket - Indicates a bucket that stores and manages values. It is mandatory and cannot be null. For details, see ValuesBucket.
        insertCallback - Indicates the InsertCallback used to process the insertion result. It is mandatory and cannot be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a parameter is illegal.
        Since:
        3

      • addUpdateJob

        public final void addUpdateJob​(JobParams jobParams,
                               ValuesBucket valuesBucket,
                               RdbPredicates rdbPredicates,
                               UpdateCallback updateCallback)
        Updates data in the database asynchronously and processes the update result.

        Use this method when updating a large amount of data in the database in the intra-process scenario.

        Parameters:
        jobParams - Indicates mandatory parameters of the task. For details, see JobParams.
        valuesBucket - Indicates a bucket that stores and manages values. It is mandatory and cannot be null. For details, see ValuesBucket.
        rdbPredicates - Indicates the RdbPredicates. It is mandatory and cannot be null.
        updateCallback - Indicates the UpdateCallback used to process the update result. It is mandatory and cannot be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a parameter is illegal.
        Since:
        3

      • addDeleteJob

        public final void addDeleteJob​(JobParams jobParams,
                               RdbPredicates rdbPredicates,
                               DeleteCallback deleteCallback)
        Deletes data from the database asynchronously and processes the deletion result.

        Use this method when deleting a large amount of data from the database in the intra-process scenario.

        Parameters:
        jobParams - Indicates mandatory parameters of the task. For details, see JobParams.
        rdbPredicates - Indicates the RdbPredicates. It is mandatory and cannot be null.
        deleteCallback - Indicates the DeleteCallback used to process the deletion result. It is mandatory and cannot be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a parameter is illegal.
        Since:
        3

      • cancelJob

        public final void cancelJob​(int token)
        Cancels asynchronous tasks with the same token.

        If different tasks share a token, use this method to cancel these tasks.

        Parameters:
        token - Indicates the token shared by the tasks. It must be consistent with that in the input parameter jobParams of the addDeleteJob, addInsertJob, addQueryJob, and addUpdateJob methods.
        Since:
        3
